sqlMap.statement: CREATE TABLE `tb_room` ( `room_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `room_nm` varchar(120) DEFAULT NULL, `room_code` varchar(12) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'emr_room_key', `status` enum('O','R','C') DEFAULT 'O' COMMENT 'Open, Rounds, Close', `use_fg` enum('Y','N') DEFAULT 'Y', `createdAt` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `updatedAt` datetime DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`room_id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='진료실';

dynamic.isNotEmpty: room.room_id in (select room_id from tb_machine_room where machine_id = #machineKey#)

sqlMap.select:
SELECT room.* FROM ( SELECT room.* ,CASE room.status WHEN 'O' THEN "진료대기" WHEN 'R' THEN "진료중" WHEN 'C' THEN "진료마감" WHEN 'S' THEN "수술중" WHEN 'E' THEN "내시경" WHEN 'H' THEN "회진" END as status_text ,usr.user_nm as doctor_nm ,usr.position ,dt.medical_kind ,dt.emr_doctor_key FROM tb_room room LEFT JOIN tb_doctor dt ON dt.emr_doctor_key = room.room_code LEFT JOIN tb_user usr ON usr.user_id = dt.doctor_id
ORDER BY createdAt ) room
LIMIT
#skipResults# ,
#maxResults#

SELECT room.* ,CASE room.status WHEN 'O' THEN "진료대기" WHEN 'R' THEN "진료중" WHEN 'C' THEN "진료마감" WHEN 'S' THEN "수술중" WHEN 'E' THEN "내시경" WHEN 'H' THEN "회진" END as status_text ,usr.user_nm as doctor_nm ,usr.position ,dt.medical_kind FROM tb_room room LEFT JOIN tb_doctor dt ON dt.emr_doctor_key = room.room_code LEFT JOIN tb_user usr ON usr.user_id = dt.doctor_id
room.room_id = #room_id#
room.room_id = (select room_id from tb_machine_room where machine_id = #machineKey# limit 1)
LIMIT 1
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE tb_room SET updatedAt = now()
,room_nm = #room_nm#
,status = #status#
,room_code = #room_code#
WHERE room_id = #room_id#
sqlMap.statement: CREATE TABLE `tb_room_doctor` ( `rel_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `room_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `emr_doctor_key` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `day` enum('M','T','W','TH','F','S','SU') NOT NULL COMMENT '월화수목금토일', `time` enum('A','P') NOT NULL COMMENT '오전오후', `createdAt` datetime DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`rel_id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

dynamic.isNotEmpty: rmdt.room_id in (select room_id from tb_machine_room where machine_id = #machineKey#)

sqlMap.select:
SELECT rmdt.* FROM ( SELECT rmdt.* FROM tb_room_doctor rmdt
ORDER BY rmdt.rel_id ) rmdt
LIMIT
#skipResults# ,
#maxResults#

SELECT room.* ,CASE room.code WHEN 'O' THEN "진료대기" WHEN 'R' THEN "진료중" WHEN 'C' THEN "진료마감" WHEN 'S' THEN "수술중" WHEN 'E' THEN "내시경" WHEN 'H' THEN "회진" ELSE '휴진' END as status_text FROM tb_room_doctor room
day = #day#
time = #time#
ORDER BY room.room_id

SELECT rmdt.* ,usr.user_nm as doctor_nm ,usr.position ,dt.medical_kind ,dt.emr_doctor_key FROM ( SELECT room.room_id ,room.room_nm ,room.status ,room.use_fg ,room.updatedAt ,IFNULL((select rmdt.emr_doctor_key from tb_room_doctor rmdt where rmdt.room_id = room.room_id and day = #day# and time = #time#), room.room_code) as room_code ,CASE room.status WHEN 'O' THEN "진료대기" WHEN 'R' THEN "진료중" WHEN 'C' THEN "진료마감" WHEN 'S' THEN "수술중" WHEN 'E' THEN "내시경" WHEN 'H' THEN "회진" END as status_text FROM tb_room room WHERE room.room_id in (select room_id from tb_machine_room where machine_id = #machineKey#) AND room.status != #not_status# ORDER BY room.room_id ) rmdt LEFT JOIN tb_doctor dt ON dt.emr_doctor_key = rmdt.room_code LEFT JOIN tb_user usr ON usr.user_id = dt.doctor_id
LIMIT
#skipResults# ,
#maxResults#

SELECT rmdt.* ,usr.user_nm as doctor_nm ,usr.position ,dt.medical_kind ,dt.emr_doctor_key FROM ( SELECT room.room_id ,room.room_nm ,room.status ,room.use_fg ,room.updatedAt ,IFNULL((select rmdt.emr_doctor_key from tb_room_doctor rmdt where rmdt.room_id = room.room_id and day = #day# and time = #time#), room.room_code) as room_code ,IF( (select count(*) from tb_room_doctor rmdt where rmdt.room_id = room.room_id and day = #day# and time = "A") = 0, "휴진", CASE (select code from tb_room_doctor rmdt where rmdt.room_id = room.room_id and day = #day# and time = "A") WHEN "R" THEN "진료대기" WHEN "S" THEN "수술중" WHEN "E" THEN "내시경" WHEN "H" THEN "회진" END)as AM ,IF( (select count(*) from tb_room_doctor rmdt where rmdt.room_id = room.room_id and day = #day# and time = "P") = 0, "휴진", CASE (select code from tb_room_doctor rmdt where rmdt.room_id = room.room_id and day = #day# and time = "A") WHEN "R" THEN "진료대기" WHEN "S" THEN "수술중" WHEN "E" THEN "내시경" WHEN "H" THEN "회진" END)as PM ,CASE room.status WHEN 'O' THEN "진료대기" WHEN 'R' THEN "진료중" WHEN 'C' THEN "진료마감" WHEN 'S' THEN "수술중" WHEN 'E' THEN "내시경" WHEN 'H' THEN "회진" END as status_text FROM tb_room room ) rmdt LEFT JOIN tb_doctor dt ON dt.emr_doctor_key = rmdt.room_code LEFT JOIN tb_user usr ON usr.user_id = dt.doctor_id ORDER BY rmdt.room_nm
LIMIT
#skipResults# ,
#maxResults#

SELECT room.room_id ,room.room_nm ,room.status ,room.use_fg ,room.createdAt ,room.updatedAt ,rmdt.emr_doctor_key as room_code ,CASE room.status WHEN 'O' THEN "진료대기" WHEN 'R' THEN "진료중" WHEN 'C' THEN "진료마감" WHEN 'S' THEN "수술중" WHEN 'E' THEN "내시경" WHEN 'H' THEN "회진" END as status_text ,usr.user_nm as doctor_nm ,usr.position ,dt.medical_kind FROM tb_room_doctor rmdt LEFT JOIN tb_room room ON room.room_id = rmdt.room_id LEFT JOIN tb_doctor dt ON dt.emr_doctor_key = rmdt.emr_doctor_key LEFT JOIN tb_user usr ON usr.user_id = dt.doctor_id WHERE rmdt.room_id = (select room_id from tb_machine_room where machine_id = #machineKey# limit 1)
day = #day#
time = #time#
room.status != #not_status#
ORDER BY room.room_id
SELECT rmdt.* FROM tb_room_doctor rmdt WHERE room_id = #room_id# and day = #day# and time = #time#

SELECT iprm.* FROM ( SELECT iprm.* ,usr.user_nm as nurse_nm FROM tb_inpat_room iprm LEFT JOIN tb_user usr ON usr.user_id = iprm.nurse_id
ORDER BY iprm.createdAt ) iprm
WHERE rownums <= #maxResults#
